name: superstrong
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
extremely strong or powerful: Their team of scientists devised the superstrong fabric that the company uses to make bulletproof vests. The plane is held together with super-strong titanium fasteners. Synonym
superstrength
More examplesFewer examplesThe industrial tape is made from super-strong carbon fibres soaked in a mixture of polymers. I drank a super-strong espresso this morning and now I feel like I can jump over a car. We were served a super-strong homemade grape brandy that made our eyes water.
